v1.19.0.description: fixes hiding the trigger paragraph on narrow video components

v1.18.0.description: fixes the video fullscreen button on IE/Edge

v1.17.0.description: fixes validation error resulting from the legend element not being a direct child of the fieldset element

v1.15.0.description: fixes multiple WCAG 2.0 AA accessibility issues

v1.13.0.description: fixes tracking and volume sliders in RTL
adds ability for video component to display an error message
fixes video menu to support RTL locales
changes video background to be transparent

v1.11.0.description: adds focus states to trigger buttons

v1.10.0.description: adds image overlay to video which when clicked, plays inline video

v1.8.0.description: fixes an issue with video play glyph toggle on autoplay
fixes an issue with video player's volume slider at vp1

v1.9.0.description: restructure timecode markup for easier targeting of time
adds data-attributes for localization and js targeting
